channel.title: Jinniyah :: Broken
channel.description:
Crackly broken beat deep atmospheric track with heavy use of the sampler & vocal pack. Bonus points if you can tell which sounds I used for the pads.
https://soundcloud.com/dakini-records/broken-jinniyah/s-i3etM

item.title: Jinniyah :: Broken
item.dc:creator: GioMakyo
item.description:
It’s actually kind of similar to a track I did back in 2001 which actually was a remix of a film score!

item.title: Jinniyah :: Broken

item.description:
I like this track . . . I could reimagine the ending of an epic film with this score !

item.title: Jinniyah :: Broken
item.dc:creator: GioMakyo
item.description:
Cheers! I’m pretty sure the shadows do the trick, but yes, maybe not best idea to open at work!

Read full topic

item.title: Jinniyah :: Broken
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Glad I checked this early!! lol, might want to include a warning about the art (which is tastefully done, imo, but nothing quite like having that fly up at work lmao…)

This track is great, I’ve been meaning to get around to listening to your stuff and glad I carved out some time. I have NO idea what sounds you’ve used but I’m honestly terrible with the sound names, maybe others here will know. Everything is on point here I very much enjoyed it, thanks for sharing!

Read full topic
